name: Model 100 Archive
tagline: Open Source Archive of TRS-80 Model 100 Software
body:
The Model 100 Archive is an open source archive of BASIC software for the TRS-80 Model 100.

Contact us at [archive@model100.in](mailto:archive@model100.in)

Have software you'd like to submit to the archive? Submit a pull request to this repository or email us ([archive@model100.in](mailto:archive@model100.in))
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
